# Snow Plow Tandem Axle Heavy Truck Requirement

## Amendment Notice

Please note that the closing time for the bid submission has been revised. It is now due on June 14, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT. Any bids submitted after this deadline will be considered non-responsive.

## Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number**: WS4578451204-Doc4588226345
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4578451204
*   **Publication Date**: May 22, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date**: June 14, 2024, 2:00 pm EDT
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2025
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: None
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

## Goods and Services Requirement

Parks Canada Agency (PCA) is seeking a bid from pre-qualified suppliers for the delivery of a heavy truck with a tandem rear axle and snow plow to Alma, New Brunswick. The truck must comply with the specifications outlined in the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HP-16TRUK/xxx/HP Group 2 Truck, Heavy, Dump.

## Scope of Work

The successful supplier will be required to deliver one (1) heavy truck with a tandem rear axle and snow plow to the specified location. The truck must meet the necessary standards and specifications outlined in the SA.

## Limitations

*   The bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers who hold an awarded Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangements (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK/xxx/HP Group 2 Truck, Heavy, Dump.
*   Suppliers must submit their bid and supporting documentation on or before the revised closing time of June 14, 2024, at 2:00 pm EDT.
